jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
The role will be based out of Jakarta, and you will be working closely with the Corporate PAC leadership to own the design and implementation of our people technology systems. You will drive the strategy and operationalization of PAC technical systems – across all GOJEK offices in Indonesia, India, Vietnam, Thailand and Singapore – to solve business challenges faced by PAC. You are responsible for bringing the right mix of technologies to life in GOJEK’s people function.

You will build relationships with Corporate PAC leadership, people partners and center of excellence teams (Talent, Learning and Rewards teams) to design and oversee the implementation of future-proof processes and systems that can be easily scaled to any new countries and branch offices. You will also own the roadmap for potential future engagements with other functional divisions, like finance.


RESPONSIBILITIES
● Partner with PAC to design, launch & oversee strategic initiatives that make People Systems a competitive advantage for GO-JEK. You will be instrumental in converting PAC’s abstract ideas into concrete plans.
● Ensure successful on-the-ground execution of these plans by aligning stakeholders across teams & driving resourcing, budgeting & process management.
● Provide visibility into status, health & resourcing to your partners across the multiple systems being run under your team.
● Identify and predict blockers, conflicts, and risks to projects across multiple teams and seek solutions to eliminate them.
● Develop strong relationships across stakeholders to understand their goals & priorities. Work with these stakeholders to help them convert these goals into reality.
● Streamline our vendor management processes to optimize budget utilization as well as ensure a successful engagement.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience
  • Minimum 10 years of experience in technical program or product management
  • Deep knowledge & appreciation of agile development practices and its inherent challenges
  • Demonstrable track record of managing large scale & impactful technology initiatives end to end
  • Show track record of long term thinking paired with execution rigor to roll out ambitious & large scale initiatives
  • Demonstrated ability to work through ambiguity to detailed solutions. You can take a vague problem, crisply frame the challenge, identify a path forward, and drive an initiative over the finish line
  • Ability to convert cross functional strategic initiatives into concrete execution plans by aligning various stakeholders & their function specific priorities
  • Mentoring track record where you have helped junior/mid-level colleagues in their career growth and coached them into learning to deliver complex programs
  • Excellent oral & verbal communication skills that you use to improve communication & information exchange across all stakeholders

  • PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
  • Bilingual in English and Bahasa Indonesia
  • Experience of Program or Product Management in the Talent / HR domain
  • IT/CS degree or equivalent practical experience
